thread.title: Pro Football Hall of Fame 2017 finalists: LaDainian Tomlinson headlines list of 15
thread.title_full: Pro Football Hall of Fame 2017 finalists: LaDainian Tomlinson headlines list of 15

author: Harry Lyles Jr.
title: Pro Football Hall of Fame 2017 finalists: LaDainian Tomlinson headlines list of 15
text:
We’re getting closer to a new group of inductees. 
The finalists for the Pro Football Hall of Fame Class of 2017 were announced on Tuesday evening, and they were headlined by former San Diego Chargers running back LaDainian Tomlinson.
Joining Tomlinson on the finalist list were former defensive end Jason Taylor, as well as safety Brian Dawkins. Kicker Morten Anderson, and head coach Don Coryell were named as well.
The list of finalists is at 15, after being trimmed down from the 26 that were announced as semifinalists back in November.
The finalists named will join Senior Finalist Kenny Easley and 2017 Contributor Finalists Jerry Jones and Paul Tagliabue when the Pro Football Hall of Fame selection committee meets to vote the day before Super Bowl LI.
We’ll update this post as more finalists are named.
